name: Lager Beer
description: A crisp, clean, and well-balanced beer with a light malt flavor.

name: IPA Beer
description: A hoppy beer with citrus and pine flavors, perfect for hop lovers.

name: Stout Beer
description: A rich and dark beer with roasted malt flavors and a smooth finish.

name: Pilsner Beer
description: A crisp, refreshing beer with a slight bitterness and a clean finish.

name: Wheat Beer
description: A light and cloudy beer with a fruity, spicy flavor profile.

name: Porter Beer
description: A dark, malty beer with notes of chocolate and coffee.

name: Saison Beer
description: A farmhouse ale with a peppery, fruity, and spicy flavor profile.

name: Amber Ale
description: A balanced beer with a slight malt sweetness and a touch of bitterness.

name: Double IPA
description: An intensely hoppy beer with a strong bitterness and higher alcohol content.

name: Pale Ale
description: A well-balanced beer with a moderate hop bitterness and a light malt backbone.

name: Blonde Ale
description: A light, smooth beer with a slight malty sweetness and a clean finish.

name: Belgian Dubbel
description: A rich, malty beer with dark fruit flavors and a smooth, warming finish.

name: Barleywine
description: A strong beer with a rich malt flavor and a noticeable hop bitterness.

name: India Pale Lager
description: A lager with the hoppy bitterness of an IPA, offering a unique twist on both styles.

name: Bitter Beer
description: A highly bitter beer with floral and citrus notes.

name: Milk Stout
description: A creamy stout with milk sugar added for a sweet and smooth finish.

name: Lambic Beer
description: A sour beer with fruity and earthy flavors, fermented with wild yeast.

name: Saison Dupont
description: A classic saison with a peppery and fruity aroma, a dry finish, and a complex taste.

name: American Pale Ale
description: A crisp, hop-forward beer with tropical fruit and citrus flavors.

name: Hefeweizen
description: A German wheat beer with banana and clove flavors, cloudy appearance.
